Current Job Openings
====================

###### The City of Hallettsville receives employment applications only for current openings. Current openings are listed below and are posted at City Hall, 101 N. Main Street, Hallettsville, TX 77964.

##### Applications/Resumes can be emailed to Finance-HR@CityofHallettsville.org , mailed to the address above or dropped off at in person at City Hall during normal business hours.

Employment Applications
-----------------------

**[City of Hallettsville Application for Employment](http://cityofhallettsville.org/files/2016%2002%2024%20Application%20for%20Employment.pdf#overlay-context=jobs) (PDF) – GENERAL APPLICATION**

**[City of Hallettsville Application for Employment with Police Supplement](http://cityofhallettsville.org/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/Application-with-Police-Supplement-7.21.2020.pdf) (PDF) – POLICE APPLICATION**

----------------

Electrical Lineman – View [**(PDF)**](https://cityofhallettsville.org/wp-content/uploads/2026/01/Electrical-Lineman-2026.pdf)

Current Appointment Opportunities
---------------------------------

Planning & Zoning Board Commissioner (1 Commissioner Seat & 1 Alternate) – **[Interest Form](https://cityofhallettsville.org/wp-content/uploads/2022/12/Application-for-PZ-Commission.pdf)** – Actively Accepting – Qualifications include: Residency of the City of Hallettsville, Taxpayer, and Qualified Voter

Library Advisory Board Member – **[Application](https://cityofhallettsville.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/Application-for-Library-Advisory-Board.pdf)** – Accepting for inside the City Limits – Qualifications include: Residency of the City of Hallettsville and/or Lavaca County

Hotel Occupancy Tax Committee – [**Application**](https://cityofhallettsville.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/04/Application-for-HOT-Committee.pdf) – Due April 1, 2026 – Qualifications include: Resident or Commercial Property owner within the City Limits of Hallettsville
